item.title: NOV
item.description: score:87 Chances: NOV Inc. has been making organizational changes and appointing new members to its board of directors, indicating a focus on strategic growth and development. The company has reported increased revenue and operating profit in its Q3 2023 earnings, showing positive financial performance.
